name: Spaceship Delivery
description:
You will play a spaceship that travels in the universe to deliver trade items between aliens. Your spaceship will meet a power drink that can upgrade the spaceship's speed for a short time or space ghosts that will decrease your speed. Also, there is a huge moon obstructing the two tradings aliens. Please shoot it to make a trading passway and help the aliens.

You can move forward/backward, turn up/down, shoot, and gather/sell trade items in this game.

Game Control:

  • A = move backward
  • D = move forward
  • W = turn up
  • S = turn down
  • Q = gather trade items
  • E = sell trade items
  • Space = shoot
  • ESC = menu

Enjoy the game!
